team.name: Mrtn
team.what: I’ve been in Nouns for over a year, and have worked on teams such as Builder, Agora, and most recently started and ran Explorer Grants and Hack Week! Before that I worked at Google and NBA Top Shot.

items.name: Full-time development for 3 months
items.description: Fund 3 months of full-time development of a Nounish explorer

items.name: Aggregated information
items.description: Delegation history, address’ voting stats, etc..

items.name: A variety of views
items.description: Proposal pages, nouns pages, feeds, and filters

items.name: Parsing non-Nouns transactions
items.description: Mogu has the whole chain’s context available, not just Nouns things.

items.name: A comprehensive search
items.description: For transaction content, props, nouns, etc..

items.name: Other experimental features
items.description: Potentially bookmarking transactions, transaction notes, user statuses

description: I’m asking for 15 ETH to go full-time on Mogu for 3 months. The goal by the end is for Mogu to be power users’ go-to tool, and for it to be the default linked block explorer across the Nouns ecosystem.
title: Mogu - a nounish explorer
